dct_title_s: Map of the region between Gettysburg, Pa. and Appomattox Court House, Va. exhibiting the connection between the campaign and battle-field maps
dct_description_sm: Index map indicates the area covered by each sheet in the atlas.; Accompanies the Corps of Engineers' Military maps Illustrating the operations of the Armies of the Potomac & James . . .; Another copy is in the James A. Garfield papers, Manuscript Division, L.C., series 8, container no. 1.; LC copy mounted on cloth and sectioned in two.
dct_publisher_sm: War Department,  Office of the Chief of Engineers (Washington,  D.C)
